S03bsa032_u:4887: tadevaṃ protsāhyamāno 'pi sādhurnālaṃ pāpe pravartitumanabhyāsāditi sajjanapraśaṃsāyāṃ vācyam /
S03bsa032_u:4888: evaṃ kṣāntikathāyāmapyupaneyam - evaṃ kṣamāparicayānna vairabahulo bhavati,
S03bsa032_u:4890: evaṃ pratisaṃkhyānabahulāḥ svāṃ guṇaśobhāmanurakṣanti paṇḍitā iti pratisaṃkhyānavarṇe vācyam /
S03bsa032_u:4891: tathāgatamāhātmye ca bhadraprakṛtyabhyāsavarṇe ca - evaṃ bhadraprakṛtirabhyastā tiryaggatānāmapi na nivartata iti /
